Initializer# init(exactly:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init?<T>(exactly source: T) where T : BinaryFloatingPoint
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Int/init(exactly:)-7yhn6#see-also)

### [Converting with No Loss of Precision](/documentation/Swift/Int/init(exactly:)-7yhn6#Converting-with-No-Loss-of-Precision)

[`init?(exactly: Double)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(exactly:)-77kq8)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, if it can be represented exactly.[`init?(exactly: Float)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(exactly:)-7qdwf)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, if it can be represented exactly.[`init?(exactly: Float16)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(exactly:)-5xh2s)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, if it can be represented exactly.[`init?(exactly: Float80)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(exactly:)-5kot1)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, if it can be represented exactly.
